title: If You Put a Leash on Villain - Novel Updates
tags: Assassins   Clever Protagonist   Confinement   Female Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Precognition   Yandere
author: Tang   탕
description:
Eclette the assassin was born with the ability to see the future.

As a child, she was driven by this ability as a witch and sold to the slave market

Then she is taken by Kiries, the head of the vicious criminal organization Anatolia. Later, when he learned of Eclette’s abilities, Kiries tied her up for ten years.

“Please, stop it now! I’ve given you everything within these ten years.”

Eclette, who ran away because she couldn’t endure such Kiries, encounters a man who has been looking for her for ten years.

He was Red Ward, the successor of the rival organization Shaden Fredue.

“I don’t want anything from you. I want you to have me. So take me. And dominate me.”

A man who suddenly appears, tells her to have him.

Kiries trying to hold her by a leash, and Red Ward, who gives himself a leash.

How will the fate of the three entangled people end?>
